name:
Settlement
Storage
desc: Storage space for ships and cargo. Shared with colony storage. Storing materials has a fee attached, this fee can be negated by either building the "Stockpile" facility, or by having a colony owned on this planet.

name: Trade Post
desc: A small markets that has been established on this settlement. Trades in common wares and the occasional ordnance known to your faction.

name: Amelie's Supply
desc: A small market of special supplies that Amelie can gather through her own connections. All items still come at a cost. She may not be able to sell certain things until her influence increases.
